import { useEffect, useRef } from 'react';
import { Stage } from 'sharc-js/dist/Stage';
import { Ellipse } from 'sharc-js/dist/Sprits';
import { Colors } from 'sharc-js/dist/Utils';

export function StageComponent() {
    const canvasRef = useRef(null);

    useEffect(() => {
        const stage = new Stage(canvasRef.current!, 'centered', Colors.LightSlateGray);

        stage.root.addChild(new Ellipse({
            radius: 100,
            color: Colors.Aqua,
        }));

        stage.loop();

        return () => {
            stage.stop();
        }
    }, []);
                            
    return <canvas ref={canvasRef} width={600} height={400} />
}
